git checkout -b main
git add .
git remote add origin https://github.com/Arsene177/Team-Z-Bafoka-.git
git config --global user.email "arsenedjonkoun5@gmail.com"
git init
npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-agreement.js --network sepolia
npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-greeter.js --network sepolia
npx hardhat console --network amoy --eval "const signer = await ethers.getSigner(); console.log('Your wallet address:', await signer.getAddress());"
npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-greeter.js --network amoy
